original_title: The FIRM: Time Crunch Cardio - Calorie-Burning Cardio
overview: Three 20-minute workouts include The Firm's 8 Second Secret - short bursts of high intensity intervals that speed up weight loss and cut workout times in half! Included are Cardio + Sculpt Combo, Fat-Blasting Bursts, and Calorie Burning Cardio, plus bonus
title: The FIRM: Time Crunch Cardio - Calorie-Burning Cardio
